subject: Day-Date Presidential Gold band Gold face Diamond # (RX254)
body:
GoldWatchDirect- Rolex, Breitling, Tag & 
More
 

 

Replicated to the smallest detail 
  98% Perfectly Acurate Markings 
  Improvement over Japanese 25 Jewel Automatic Movement! ("sweep 
  second-hand") 
  Includes all Proper Markings 
  Sapphire Crystal glass face 
  Signature Green Sticker w/ serial number on watch back 
  Precise Unidirectional turning bezel 
  Dazzling colored face 
  Flawless dual-lustre metal band 
  "Hack" Function effective during setting 
  One piece screw-down crown w/ engravings 
  Adjustable links on band 
  Link connected by threaded screws not pins 
  Fully Functional Date Mechanisms 
  Magnified Quickset Date 
  Signature Double Locking Clasp 
  Doesn't need a battery 
  Luminescent Hour Markers 
  Heavily and Strongly constructed 
  Differences only detectable by most skilled jewelers 
  Near exact weight of original
